title: Lambdaform Event executor
description: Wrapper around the 'sam local generate-event' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-generate-event.html)

create.description: Defines the path where the event file should be created.

args.description: Used to provide additional arguments to the SAM CLI. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-generate-event.html)

shell.description: Shell to execute the command with. Uses '/bin/sh' on Unix, and 'process.env.ComSpec' on Windows, if no shell is specified.
